thread.title: Arun Jaitley: Govt committed to rural sanitation, housing
thread.title_full: Arun Jaitley: Govt committed to rural sanitation, housing - The Financial Express

author: FE Online
title: Arun Jaitley: Govt committed to rural sanitation, housing
text:
FM Arun Jaitley today indicated that the downtrodden in society were the prime focus. (ANI) Highlighting the Narendra Modi -led NDA government’s economic agenda and its priorities, FM Arun Jaitley today indicated that the downtrodden in society were the prime focus and it was looking to empower citizens as much as possible with current resources at its disposal. Not just that, FM Jaitley also highlighted the fact that the government was looking to achieve its goal as much as possible by getting the public itself to participate. FM said, “Government is committed to rural sanitation and housing; it has taken various steps to achieve that with people’s participation.”
FM Jaitley explained some of the efforts of the government to reach out to virtually all of India by saying, “Government has taken steps to electrify all villages and will achieve the set target soon.”
You may also like to watch this video :
Addressing at the HCL Grant 2017 event, Finance Minister Arun Jaitley emphasised the government’s measures to electrify all villages across India and is slated to achieve the target soon. The Finance Minister also added that the NDA government is committed to rural sanitation and housing. He mentioned that several steps have been taken to achieve these, most importantly with people’s participation.
Government has taken steps to electrify all villages & will achieve target soon: FM Arun Jaitley at HCL Grant 2017 pic.twitter.com/Q9U1CQm4Mp
— ANI (@ANI_news) February 21, 2017
